remarks: Two intersecting lines intersect at an atom.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-2012.)
statement:
2lnat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
2lnat.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2lnat.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
2lnat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2lnat.n $e |- N = ( Lines ` K ) $.
2lnat.f $e |- F = ( pmap ` K ) $.
2lnat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( ( F ` X ) e. N /\ ( F ` Y ) e. N ) /\ ( X =/= Y /\ ( X ./\ Y ) =/= .0. ) ) -> ( X ./\ Y ) e. A ) $.
